committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act to prohibit demolition or substantial alteration of properties designated as National Historic Landmarks.

summary.text: Amends the National Historic Preservation Act to prohibit the demolition or substantial alteration (other than to the extent necessary for the preservation of the structure) of properties designated as National Historic Landmarks.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act to prohibit demolition or substantial alteration of properties designated as National Historic Landmarks.
